LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Homesteader.title: 自耕农
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Homesteader.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚自耕农. 她被本地军阀强征入伍.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Youth.title: 青年
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Youth.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚青年, 她希望在战争中感受刺激和荣誉.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArmyReserve.title: 后备役
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArmyReserve.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚后备役. 她受到了良好的训练来应对这场战争.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Officer.title: 军官
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Officer.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚军官. 她家里世世代代都是军人.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Laborer.title: 劳工
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Laborer.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚石油公司的劳工.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArtStudent.title: 艺术生
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_ArtStudent.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚艺术生. 她被本地的艺术学院录取了，但是战争摧毁了一切.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Veteran.title: 老兵
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Veteran.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚老兵. 她重新加入军队，因为她的养老金已经有几个月没发放了.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_SpecialForce.title: 特种部队
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_SpecialForce.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚特种部队的成员. 她有着完美的战斗技巧，和一些不可告人的过去.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Warlord.title: 军阀
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Warlord.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚军阀. 她拥有一切, 因此总是担心有别人来抢走她的财产.
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Spokesperson.title: 发言人
LanguageData.Anneli_Jurnizia_Spokesperson.description: [PAWN_nameDef]扮演一名切尼亚发言人. 她的工作就是吹嘘胜利和否认战败.
